messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Christian Vassie, Liberal Democrat Candidate, lives and works in York. His children attend state schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fair taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn - cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more money into schools, and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Christian Vassie, Liberal Democrat Candidate, lives and works in York. His children attend state schools.

endorsements.endorsement: I am delighted to endorse Christian Vassie as the Liberal Democrat candidate for York Central, a role I once played myself. Christian has energy and passion and has shown, on the city council, a real ability to get things done.

images.caption: Christian Vassie pictured with endorsement quote from Vince Cable MP.
